Sign Features

Standard Features:

  • Corrugated Plastic Construction

Premium Add-ons:

  • Solar LED Lighting

Why Choose Our Lawn Signs?

Our lawn signs are designed specifically for real estate professionals who demand quality and durability. Each sign is crafted with premium materials and built to withstand various weather conditions while maintaining their professional appearance.

With customizable options and professional-grade construction, our signs help you make a strong impression in your local market. Whether you're hosting an open house or marketing a new listing, our signs will help you stand out from the competition.

Available Styles

Standard Style:

  • • 18" x 24" Corrugated Plastic
  • • Basic H-Stakes
  • • Double-Sided Printing
  • • Standard Colors

Premium Style:

  • • 24" x 36" Heavy-Duty Plastic
  • • Metal Frame Option
  • • Premium Printing
  • • Extended Color Options

Technical Specifications

Materials:

  • • Corrugated Plastic (4mm)
  • • UV-Resistant Ink
  • • Galvanized Steel Stakes
  • • Weather-Resistant Coating

Dimensions:

  • • Standard: 18" x 24"
  • • Premium: 24" x 36"
  • • Stake Height: 36"
  • • Weight: 2-4 lbs
